input.sentences: nature comes in a plethora of shapes and forms . this fungus has attached to the side of a tree .
this tree has natural bark to protect it from predators | but sometimes claws are able to penetrate .
flowers have bright colors to attract bees | but sometimes other insects eat their leaves .
caterpillars eat leaves non-stop until they form their cocoon .
flowers come in many shapes and sizes to allow for a wide range of insects to pollinate them .
output.sentences: Besides trees the sights in a forest come in a plethora of shapes.
Trees give protection to the assorted smaller predators that take their shape.
Forests are decorated by the shapes of leaves, insects and flowers.
